text: "We've Got Tonite" is a 1978 song by Bob Seger. It was taken from his 10th studio album Stranger in Town. It went to number 13 in the United States, number 22 in the United Kingdom, number 31 in Australia, number 12 in New Zealand and number 9 in Canada. In 1983, the song was covered by Kenny Rogers featuring Sheena Easton. In 2002, it was covered by Ronan Keating. title: We've Got Tonite
